title: Catching Snow Globes
description: Are you hiding a secret? Jordan is. But heâ€™s not the only one. When Jordan and Crisp see men in suits walk along in the mud and seemingly disappear into a concealed doorway, it begins an adventure tougher than they could have dreamed of. Using their distinct skills, Jordan and Crisp have to break into WVW headquarters, escape kidnap and stop these men before the curse shakes apart everything they love.  With the recent disasters in Australia, more than ever, people are feeling the need to look after each other and their unique environment. Teens often use fiction to validate their feelings and this book can help them see the varying types of enemies facing Australia and the need for heroes to protect their home. The motivations that propel a lot of teens, mystery, sport and a competitive spirit, also propel this book.Buy now at Amazon!http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_sb_nos...
author: Lucinda Ireland
